creator: christoph.schragen@gmx.at
text:
it would be helpful if one can enable/disable the download of embedded 
ressources of all httpsampler with a property. if this property exists, the 
checkbox values of httpsamplers and "http defaults gui" are overridden.

creator: christoph.schragen@gmx.at
text:
Created attachment 20812
patch for enabling embedded downloads per property
